display_name: Central Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (central apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and >= 4% oxygen desaturation or with arousal) / hour of sleep
calculation: 60 * (hremba4 + hroa4 + hnrba4 + hnroa4 + urbpa4 + uropa4 + unrbpa4 + unropa4 + carbp + carop + canbp + canop ) / slpprdp
